xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/401769-Bholi Bhali Ladki 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Dev along with his friends go for a holiday to the hills, where he meets Gunja & slowly their meetings develop into love. Renuka ,Devs childhood friend is jealous, because from childhood she has dreamt of marrying him. In a fit of anger Renuka wants to destroy their love & so she takes the help of Gunjas fiancee Jagga. Before they could succeed Gunjas elder brother Manga, tells them all their plans. Bholi Bhali Ladki
